question: For so many years(since I was a very young girl) I have been having a dream that I am getting married but in every dream I find my self angry and not happy
answer:
QUESTION
For so many years(since I was a very young girl) I have been having a dream that I am getting married but in every dream I find my self angry and not happy and not satisfied. Does this dream has any significance.
ANSWER


Share:
The dream has no significance. You should ignore the dream.

As a Muslim, turn your gaze to Allah and place your trust in Him and make Du?aa for a prosperous future.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
